tool_description: This API provides data for agricultural purposes, from Sentinel 2 satellites data to elaborate agronomic index
title: Agri Index Data

api_list.name: /wms
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://agri-index-data.p.rapidapi.com/wms"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "agri-index-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: POST /index
api_list.description:
elaborates the agronomic index for the region of interest for each Sentinel 2 image in the interval.
Returns a geoTiff image with one band per date
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://agri-index-data.p.rapidapi.com/index"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "agri-index-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /search
api_list.description: this endpoint retrieves the dates in which Sentinel 2 sats passed over the given bounding box. Optionally a cloud cover percentage can be described to filter out the dates that have less than the specified number
api_list.code:

print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET /index
api_list.description: this endpoint returns the agronimic indexes that this API can calculate

api_list.name: POST /index
api_list.description:
elaborates the agronomic index for the region of interest for each Sentinel 2 image in the interval.
Returns a geoTiff image with one band per date
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://agri-index-data.p.rapidapi.com/index"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "agri-index-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
